div.p: Welcome to In Our Name, an AU Sailor Moon Roleplay!

div.p: Our skins are by bonbon. Mini Profile was modified by Scowl. Main Profile created by Scowl. Sailor Moon is copyrighted to Naoko Takeuchi.

div.div:
<% BOARD %>

customIndex.init({
	page: "",
	html: "

{%marker}{%link}
{%topics} topics, {%replies} replies
{%description}
{%subforumlist}
Last post by {%lp-author} on {%lp-date} in {%lp-title}.",
	conf: {
		target:			"board",
		subforumSeperator:	", ",
		subforumNone:		"This forum has no subforums.",
		addBefore:		false,
		addAfter:		false,
		dateDefault:		"--",
		titleDefault:		"----",
		authorDefault:		""
	}
});
customStats.init({
	html: "

welcome to
{%stats#newest}
our newest member

we currently have {%stats#posts} posts written by {%stats#members} members. the most users online at once was {%stats#most} on {%stats#date}.

 there are currently {%users} users online. 
currently online:: {%sort#activity}, {%sort#username} {%users#list} 
online today {%online-today#list}"
});
customTopics.init({
	html: "

{%folder} {%marker} {%title}
{%description}
{%pagination}started by {%starter}, this topic has {%replies} replies.last post by {%author}, {%date}. {%checkbox}",
	conf: {
		target:			"board",
		announcementsDefault:	"Announcements",
		pinnedDefault:		"Important Topics",
		regularDefault:		"Forum Topics",
		noTopics:		"No topics were found. This is either because there are no topics in this forum, or the topics are older than the current age cut-off."
	}
});



/* Jcink Dice Roll BBCode Button */
$("#bbcode-buttons").append('');

	    	

	    	    <% SKIN_SELECTOR %>
	    	

skin by bonbon.

<% COPYRIGHT %>
	    	$('#logo a img[src="style_images/1/spacer.gif"]').replaceWith('');

//MULTI QUOTE CODE
// By VoidPC
var quote = "",
   noquote = "";
if (/showtopic=|act=ST/i.test(location.href)) {
    brownie.mod('http://voidpc.jcink.net/uploads/voidpc/multiquote_2_0.js');
}
if (/Replying in|Posting New Topic/i.test(document.title)) {
   var m = brownie.get('multiquote');
   if (m) {
       for (var i = 0, a = m.split(','), b = a.length; i < b; i++) {
           document.REPLIER.Post.value += brownie.get('multiquote-p' + a[i]);
           brownie.del('multiquote-p' + a[i]);
       }
       brownie.del('multiquote');
   }
}

<% ionsiteinfo %>
